example[0]: At school the other children treated them like royalty.
definition[1]: a payment made to the writer of a book or piece of music depending on how many books etc are sold, or to someone whose idea, invention etc is used by someone else to make money
example[1]: the royalties from his latest book
definition[2]: a payment made to someone who owns a COPYRIGHT or a PATENT (=legal right to be the only producer or seller of something), for example an inventor or the writer of a book. The amount depends on the number of products or copies of the work which are sold
example[3]: The writer gets a 10% royalty on each copy of his book.
example[4]: Royalties from the song will go to charity.
definition[3]: a payment made to someone for the right to remove minerals from their land
